# SignatureDrop.claim property

Claim NFTs to the connected wallet.

**Signature:**

```typescript
claim: {
        (quantity: import("ethers").BigNumberish, options?: import("../..").ClaimOptions | undefined): Promise<import("../../core/types").TransactionResultWithId<NFT>[]>;
        prepare: (quantity: import("ethers").BigNumberish, options?: import("../..").ClaimOptions | undefined) => Promise<import("../..").Transaction<import("../../core/types").TransactionResultWithId<NFT>[]>>;
    };
```
